entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 03:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
